title: Another Dopefish sighting...
content: Not sure if anyone's mentioned this before, but in the ROTT Goodies archive that 3DRealms recently released, there are overhead graphics of all the maps in the game, similar to what you might see if you opened the map in TED5.  There's also a section for 'rejected' maps that never made it.  The [img]http://www.shikadi.net/pckf/rott/rott_rejectlevel_00_sm.png[/img] looks rather interesting... (I shrunk that one down so you could see it more easily, the [img]http://www.shikadi.net/pckf/rott/rott_rejectlevel_00.png[/img] is a bit too large to see the overall structure.)

title: Re: Another Dopefish sighting...
content: Whoa!! That is cool! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopekeen.gif[/img] Thanks for posting.You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!
